Producer: Andrew Form, Rick Lashbrook, Tag Mendillo
Screenwriter: James Frey, James Frey, Doug Ellin
Sound Mix: Dolby SR, DTS, Dolby Stereo, Surround, SDDS, Dolby A, Dolby Digital
Synopsis: A brokenhearted writer (Jason Lee) plays matchmaker for his book editor (Mili Avital) and his womanizing best friend (David Schwimmer).
Title: Kissing a Fool
